overview: Trade description warning! In fact, once mega-hung Joel Tamir has morphed his doggy companion into fresh-faced newbie, David Mannix, itâ€™s pretty much business as usual in this STAXUS classic; as Vitali Kutcher and Beno Eker lead a cock-crazed cast of red hot twinks sucking and fucking their way to jizzy ecstasy time and time again!
title: Puppy Love
